gfc.map: Click on "Update map" to visualize the data
gfc.hist: Click on "Compute areas" to analyse the gfc data on your selected aoi. The process can take several minutes.
gfc.export: Click on "Export" to export the data to your sepal folder. The process can take time.
gfc.msg: Click on "Export" to export the data
gfc.no_aoi: No aoi have been provided, select one in step 1
gfc.no_viz: Before launching the export, it is strongly advised to vizualize data
txt: Considering the Aoi selected in **step 1** and the parameters selected in **step 2**, the module will generate a combination of the GFC layers to produce a forest change map, for a given canopy cover threshold and between specific dates. It will live in a `~/module_results/gfc_wrapper/<aoi_name>/` folder of your sepal environment.
-   The map of the forest change mask using the color tab presented in the interactive maps (`..._gfc_map.tif`)
-   The distribution of each defined zone (`..._gfc_stat.csv`)
